msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Puget Sound Regional Branch

org.orgName: District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington

div1.p: In the District Court, holding terms at Seattle in King County, Washington Territory.
In the matter of the application of C. W. Hutchinson for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Territory of Washington) County of King )ss.

L. C. Gilman, being first duly sworn, on oath says; that he is the attorney of the above-named C. W. Hutchinson, and makes this affidavit in behalf of said Hutchinson; that an execution has been issued to the Sheriff of King County, Washington Territory, on the judgment in the above-entitled proceeding, and said execution has been returned by said Sheriff "no property found"; that the judgment debtor in this proceeding, W. H. Harris, has property subject to execution in Pierce County, Washington Territory. L. C. Gilman Subscribed and sworn to before me this 3rd day of December, A.D. 1885.

To the Clerk of the above-entitled Court: Please issue an alias execution on the judgment in the above-entitled proceeding, directed to the Sheriff of Pierce County, Washington Territory Rasin & Gilman and J. H. Lewis Attorneys for C. W. Hutchinson
No. 4704 In the District Court, Third Judicial District, holding Terms at Seattle
In the matter of the application plaintiff vs. of C W Hutchinson for Writ of Habeas Corpus Defendant
Filed Dec 3 1885 James Seavey, Clerk. By James P Ludlow Deputy Clerk.
Burke & Rasin. Rasin & Gilman Attorneys for
